isPartyRaceType.description: Checks if entire deck has a certain link skill

isEnemyRaceType.description: Checks if enemy has a certain link skill

isOverFightingPower.description: Checks current attack and defense is over a number

isUnderFightingPower.description: Checks current attack and defense is under a number

isOverHpRateOverEnergy.description: HP is above percent, Ki is above number

isOverHpRateUnderEnergy.description: HP is above percent, Ki is below number

isUnderHpRateOverEnergy.description: HP is below percent, Ki is above number

isUnderHpRateUnderEnergy.description: HP is under percent, Ki is below number

isOverTargetNum.description: More than a number of enemies

isUnderTargetNum.description: Less than a number of enemies

isOverTargetHpRate.description: Enemy target HP above a percent

isUnderTargetHpRate.description: Enemy target HP below a percent

isPartyExistChara.description: Check if character is present in deck

isLinkNum.description: Check if at number of links or greater are active

isOverHpRateEnableSpecial.description: HP is above percent, card has enough ki to super

isUnderHpRateEnableSpecial.description: HP is below percent, card has enough ki to super

isSlotElementType.description: Checks if any cards on rotation are a certain element

isEnemyExistChara.description: Check if character is an enemy

isCombinationAttack.description: Activates if there are three enemy attacks

isChangeEnergyBallColor.description: Checks if there is a ki of a certain type on the board

isBetweenHpRate.description: Checks if card HP percent is between two numbers

isOverTeamCategoryNum.description: Check if category card is present

hasAllElementBitpatternCards.description: Checks if deck has all types of an element bitset

isOverHpRateAndElapsedTurn.description: HP is above percent, battle has past turn number

isUnderHpRateAndElapsedTurn.description: HP is below percent, battle has past turn number

isTargetElementTypeBitPattern.description: Check if enemy element matches element bitset

isSpecialAttack.description: Activates if card has used a special attack

isOverTeamUniqueCardNum.description: Activates if deck has card with name

isEnergyBallGetNum.description: Activates if card gets more then specified Ki amount

isDodgeSuccess.description: Activates if card has evaded an attack

isCountUp.description: 1 SA performed, 2 Attacks performed, 3 Attacks revived

isContainsCardByCategoryAndUniqueInfo.description: Activates if card is in target category and unique info relations
